task.title: Available affixes
task.shortdesc: How to find out how many prefixes and suffixes an item has.

context.p: A Magic or Rare item may not always have the full number of affixes, offering the option of an additional prefix or suffix to be added via different crafting methods.
Here is how to check for available affix slots:

step.cmd: Hover the cursor over an item.
Press and hold the Alt key.
A window showing the item's affixes and their name and type will open.
